definitions.title: n.f.
definitions.body: part, portion;—´[[מ]] Ex 29:26 + 4 t.; (on [[מְנָֽת־]] Je 13:25, cf. Ps 16:5, v. [[מְנׇת]]); pl. [[מָנוֹת]] 1Sa 1:4 + 5 t.; sf. [[מָֽנוֹתֶ֫הָ]] Es 2:9; —part, portion, esp. choice portion, Ex 29:26, Le 7:33, Le 8:29 (all of sacrificial animal; all P); cf. 2Ch 31:19; also 1Sa 1:4, 1Sa 1:5; of distrib. of choice bits Ne 8:10, Ne 8:12, Es 9:19, Es 9:22; cf. also Es 2:9 (v. Da 1:5, Da 1:10).
